com.mygdx.pirategame

Class Hud

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.pirategame.Hud
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class Hud
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Hud Produces a hud for the player This shows the number of coins, health, points the player has Also displays time remaining for any powerups collected
